features: 【Honeycomb Breathable Tpe Seat Cushion】 1-inch thick seat cushion with a layer of honeycomb tpe embedded in memory foam. The upgrade exclusive design to offer a breathable and comfortable sitting experience for individuals who sit for long periods and are sensitive to heat. The honeycomb design ensures an even distribution of pressure on the cushion and enhances heat dissipation. Additionally, it provides excellent support and comfort.

【Innovative Design】 This office chair cushion is designed with innovation, incorporating a 1-inch tpe layer into the memory foam. This upgrade exclusive design addresses the issue of inadequate support in traditional tpe seat cushions and the discomfort of sitting for extended periods on memory foam cushions. It enhances both the support and comfort provided by the seat cushion.Even if you are an obese person.

【Pain Relief】 The office chair cushions are made with a U-shaped design to provide pain relief. It can effectively reduce pain caused by sitting for long periods, such as tailbone and sciatic pain. It also has a certain alleviating effect on lower back pain. This car seat cushion is suitable for use in office chairs, car seats, and hard seats. The non-slip bottom makes it suitable for all types of chairs. Additionally, it has a upgrade exclusive design machine-washable zippered breathable cover for easy cleaning.

【Excellent Support and Comfort】 Great support and comfort are offered by the combination of a honeycomb tpe layer and memory foam. The tpe layer adds a cool and soft feel, as well as some support. The upgrade exclusive design memory foam layer enhances the seat cushion's support and comfort while also providing a soft touch. This innovative design significantly improves the overall support and comfort of the chair cushion.Because of the dual support of the upgrade exclusive design,it’s also suitable for heavy people.

【Practical Gifts for Anyone】 This upgrade exclusive design memory foam seat cushion is perfect for various settings such as the office, gaming, dining, car, plane, train, and sports game bleachers. A wonderful gift for loved ones, express your gratitude to friends and family by presenting them with this cozy and inventive chair pad, ideal for improving their everyday sitting comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable chair I normally sit on is too low to get out of easily. This works great happy I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit High but Comfortable - Breathable
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been giving this cushion some sitting time for two weeks already and I like it. The support is good and I agree with other reviews that mention it as a thick cushion. I’ve had to adjust my seat a little lower while using it. What I like is the firm support it provides and the breathability it has. On the flip side the U-shape is a bit too much and I’m not sure it’s providing the right support I need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great product, so comfortable, will buy it again for the rest of the office

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The only reason I didn't give this cushion a 4 star rating is it doesn't have a handle. This was a replacement item for my previous cushion (MIA now) which did have a handle which made it convenient to schlep around all day volleyball tournaments while being kind to my behind.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After couple months I can say firmness is not decaying and comfort is still very high.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very Cushy and Comfy!
reviews.reviewText: Got this TPE Seat Cushion primarily to use for road trips in my RV. The RV is on a Ford Transit chassis and the stock Ford seats are not known for being comfortable. I've only been able to do a few short trips (30 minutes or less each) with the cushion so far, but this cushion is significantly more comfortable than the stock seats!The non-skid bottom keeps the cushion from sliding around on the seat, which is good because it's a few inches shorter from front to back than the stock Transit seat. This actually makes the cushion not quite as comfortable as it could be, because my thighs angle down from the cushion to the original seat before the drop off to the floor. (Hopefully that makes sense!)Keep in mind that this cushion with its memory foam is thick! 3+ inches tall means you may need to adjust your seat down. Unfortunately, my seat was already adjusted down all the way, so now I'm sitting a little taller than I like. Not a deal breaker for me, particularly because of the added comfort, but something to consider.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable mostly, sometimes feels like you're sliding out of the chair
reviews.reviewText: This adds a good level of support but I wish it was overall a bit bigger, as it sort of leaves my front legs dropping down with a few inches left of the chair, and because of the slope, it sometimes feels like you're sliding out of the chair. The cover feels like it's just a little too small for the foam & silicone like material inside though, as it is actually more comfortable without it on, but then it looks bad and probably wouldn't hold up as well. The correct way to sit on it is like in the pictures, with the gap in the back (for your tailbone) and the hump in the front so that there are grooves for your legs.For someone like me with barely any "junk in the trunk" it can be very uncomfortable to sit on chairs without enough support or cushion, and this does the trick. It's much better at dissipating heat as well, so no more sweaty feeling after long office days or gaming sessions. I also probably need a new chair as the material is cracking in spots, and this elevates my legs away from that spot, which is a nice bonus.
